attributes.action: recommend 7 year old Charlie Simpson for an honour in recognition of his outstanding achievement in raising £70,000 for Haiti by completing a five mile sponsored bicycle ride.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This little boy was so moved by the plight of the people of Haiti following the recent earthquake, that he decided to do a five mile sponsored bike ride with his father round their local park. He asked his mother to help him design a sponsorship form and post it online. The outcome was that he raised approximately £70,000.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
